scenario_text.value:
Ow... I got so worked up I tripped over my
own feet... But yeah, I’m all right.

Hey, where are you rushing off to? You don’t
want to go that way, it’s dangerous!
Takuma, we have to hurry or...
You look like you fell. Are you all right?

Don’t worry! Takuma’s got me, so everything’s
fine!
Uwaaah! It’s... It’s a monster! Stay back!

Oh, we don’t have time for this! Miyuki,
Agumon, let’s go!
